S

Server - Class in housewifei
Server Object Controls the house automation.
Server(int) - Constructor for class housewifei.Server
Default constructor with number of pin.
Server(String, String) - Constructor for class housewifei.Server
Future final controller with config files as input.
ServerNotifier - Class in housewifei
ServerNotifier Object Used by controllers (see Controller) to communicate with a server (see Server).
ServerNotifier() - Constructor for class housewifei.ServerNotifier
 
setDescription(String) - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Changes the description of this controller.
setEnvironment(EnvironmentSimulation) - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Setter for environment simulation.
setEventListener(ServerNotifier) - Method in class housewifei.Server
Sets the ServerNotifier for this server.
setPin(int) - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Sets the pin on which this controller is connected.
setServer(ServerNotifier) - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Sets the server notifier on which this controller is connected.
setState(int) - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Setter for internally saved state.
setState(int) - Method in class housewifei.EnvironmentSimulation
Sets the environmental state of this simulation, and notifies all the controllers that might be listening if the environmental state was changed.
startAllControllers() - Method in class housewifei.Server
Starts all controllers connected to this server.
startController() - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Starts the controller thread.
startController(int) - Method in class housewifei.Server
Starts a single controller on a certain pin.
startServer() - Method in class housewifei.Server

Starts the simulation.

Starts the simulation.
stopAllControllers() - Method in class housewifei.Server
Gracefully stops all controllers connected to this server.
stopController() - Method in class housewifei.Controller
Stops gracefully the controller thread.
stopController(int) - Method in class housewifei.Server
Stops a single controller on a certain pin.
